entry.title: How can I develop an add-on that needs an object that doesn't exist in the DI API?
entry.content:
How can I develop an add-on that needs an object that doesn't exist in the DI API?

The object in question is the tax combination (otfc).

Am I so wrong in trying to develop using direct insertion into SQL? When using ONNM and SqlTransaction

entry.title: Inventory Multiple Counters Service Layer
entry.content:
Can someone help me by explaining how to create inventory counting - multiple counters using a service layer in SAP Business One 10.0?

Code the prioject is ".NET "

I've managed to do it with individual counts, but not with group counts, which is what I need

entry.title: Field Cardname in Sap B1
entry.content: Is it possible to expand the "Cardname" field to more than 100 characters in SAP Business One 10.0?

entry.title: API integration with SAP Business One
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,
I have a question regarding to API integration with SAP Business One. Currently we are using SAP Business One On-Premises and we plan to build a AI Chatbot system and want to integrate with SAP Business One to get all the information such as AP and AR info through SAP B1 API.

I would like to understand whether any license type of SAP Business One require or not in order to integrate it with our new AI Chatbot develop system? If yes, what is the license type needed for this integration?

Thanks,

Sondara

entry.title: Rename
entry.content: Dear SAP Support  I want ask one Question How to Rename Change Log ? Ctrl Double click Can't Rename ?

entry.title: Receipt from Production (Final Product Price not calculated)
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

We are using SAP B1 v.10 and we have setup non perpetual inventory .

Everything works as expected as far as the last evaluation price is concernerd apart from the production module.

Specifiacally, we implement the following steps:

1. We issue the components of the production order (Issue for production)

2. We receive the final product (Receipt from production)

3. We run the Inventory Audit report for the final product

4. The last evaluated price remains blank

5. We close the production order and run again the Inventory Audit report.

6. The last evaluated price remains blank once again.

Any suggestions on what might be wrong?

Thank you in advance.

entry.content:

Need to know how to troubleshoot this

entry.title: SAPB1 Service Layer Error while connecting to database server
entry.content:
Dear SAP SDN Team,

Last week ReInstalled SLD - and all SAP Servvices - Services Layer Properly worked - with b1s/v1 login

Today Getting this error - other side on 1 user can access it through Postman 
on local server getting this error after username b1i and password entering
{ "error" : { "code" : 100000027, "message" : { "lang" : "en-us", "value" : "Error while connecting to database server 10.30.1.9\\INST_10\n" } } }

SAP B1 is Properly working - there is no issue with Database server connectivity.

entry.title: Error While Transferring Asset Between Locations in Same State SAP Business one
entry.content:
I’m facing an issue while trying to transfer an asset from one location to another within the same state in SAP. When attempting the transfer, the following error message appears:

Cannot add document; depreciation of source asset ‘HR01FA30040’ cannot be later than depreciation of target asset ‘HR04FA60112’.”

Could you please help analyze and guide on how to resolve this issue?
I’ve verified that both assets belong to the same state, and depreciation has been run as per the schedule.

entry.content:
Hi Experts;

I'm trying to import a Goods Receipt PO using Data Transfer. The error I'm getting is:

Created Failed In "Amount (FC)" "From" field, enter a number , 'GS' In "Amount (FC)" "From" field, enter a number , 'GS'65171.

If anyone could provide some guidance, I would appreciate it.

entry.title: SAP for Me Access and Authorization Issues for Business One Customers
entry.content:
Hello,

We are SAP Business One customers. I want to access SAP for Me (https://me.sap.com) to track software downloads, licenses, maintenance status, and support-related information.

Although I can log in to SAP for Me, I receive authorization errors in several areas. SAP Support has informed me that these issues must be resolved by our partner.

However, our partner has opened a support request with SAP, but despite multiple requests, they have not shared the Case ID. It's been over a week, and there is still no progress. Therefore, we are unable to track the incident and resolve our authorization issues in SAP for Me.

My Questions:

As an SAP Business One customer, do I need my partner's approval to access software downloads and license information in SAP for Me?

Do customers have administrative rights in SAP for Me, or is this entirely under the partner's control?

What is the correct procedure for resolving SAP for Me authorization and company assignment issues in Business One environments?

Any clarification or guidance would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you.

entry.title: Restrict the Delete/Drop/Truncate command on SQL Server.
entry.content: Can we restrict the Delete/Drop/Truncate command on SQL Server for the SAP B1 database?

entry.title: In a World of Uncertainty, How Does SAP Help Leaders Stay Ahead?
entry.content:
In a World of Uncertainty, How Does SAP Help Leaders Stay Ahead?

Crisis Becomes the New Normal

Global supply chains wobble. Regulation and compliance demands increase. Markets change overnight. For CEOs, CTOs and CHROs, this shift demands fast action, not slow response.

SAP Tools Designed for Change

SAP helps leaders stay ready through:

  • Integrated data and systems: With SAP, different systems—finance, supply chain, HR—link up so decision-makers see the full picture.
  • Real-time insight: Data flows into dashboards fast, so leaders don’t wait for end-of-month reports.
  • Embedded intelligence and automation: AI and smart tools inside SAP solutions help reduce manual work and highlight key trends.

Why This Matters to the C-Suite

Speed, clarity and resilience matter. With reliable data, leaders make faster, more confident decisions. Connected systems and smart tools help organizations bounce back from disruption. :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}

Practical Leadership Scenarios

  • A CFO sees live cash-flow changes during a supply-shock and adjusts strategy next day.
  • A COO uses SAP tools to switch suppliers automatically when risk levels spike.
  • A CHRO identifies staffing gaps across regions via unified HR and operations data.

Key Actions for Leaders

To thrive in uncertainty:

  • Focus on data alignment — ensure every function shares the same definitions and metrics.
  • Build governance — with uncertainty comes risk, so traceability and control matter.
  • Promote a culture of agility — teams must adapt quickly, empowered by insights not held back by tools.

Conclusion

Change isn’t slowing down; it’s speeding up. For leaders to succeed, the right systems matter as much as the right mindset. SAP provides the backbone. But it’s leadership that turns insight into impact.

Soft CTA:
If you’re exploring how your organization can build resilience with SAP solutions, join peer discussions in the SAP Community or connect with experts who are navigating change every day.

entry.title: GRPO Remains Open Even Though Item Quantities, Freight and A/P Invoice Fully Match.
entry.content:
We are experiencing an issue where a Goods Receipt PO (GRPO) remains in Open status even though the document flow is fully completed. The related A/P Invoice was created using Copy From → GRPO or Copy To → GRPO, and all item quantities and freight values match exactly. The payment is also fully applied to the A/P Invoice. Despite this, the GRPO does not close automatically.

Please let me know why the GRPO is not auto-closing despite 100% matching item quantities and freight values.

Find the image of the relationship map for your reference.

entry.title: what is the the field GTSRegNum in OCRD
entry.content: In Business partner list window, GTSRegNum field can select. But Which information is store in this field. On Which tab,it is appear in Business partner UI screen ?

entry.title: Crystal report not supressing empty sub-report
entry.content:
I have a subreport reading 3 fields form a database. The contents of those fields are as following:

Field LOT

 displayed as:

'LOT: ' + {BatchNumbers.BatchNum}

suppressed on:

{BatchNumbers.BatchNum} = "" OR ISNULL({BatchNumbers.BatchNum})

 Field EXP

Displayed as:

{BatchNumbers.MHD Text} + ' ' + CSTR(YEAR({BatchNumbers.ExpDate}),0,'') + '-' + CSTR(MONTH({BatchNumbers.ExpDate}), '00',0)

suppressed on:

{BatchNumbers.BatchNum} = "" OR ISNULL({BatchNumbers.BatchNum})

Field Quantity

Displayed directly, suppressed on:

{BatchNumbers.Gesamtmenge} = {BatchNumbers.Quantity}

That is the whole subreport, it is set in the main report to be suppressed if empty. However, that does not work; I still get the subreport-area in the main report. How can I get rid of it?

entry.title: Request for Access to Inventory Aging Report for Limited Financial License Users
entry.content:
Dear Team,

It has come to our attention that the Inventory Aging Report is currently inaccessible under the Limited Financial license in SAP Business One. As this report resides within the Inventory/Logistics module, it falls outside the scope of the Limited Finance license capabilities.
However, this report is critical for monitoring stock movement and supporting month-end reconciliation activities. Given its relevance to financial operations, we believe Limited Financial users should be granted access to it.
Could you please advise on the possibility of enabling access or suggest an alternative approach to ensure these users can retrieve the necessary inventory aging data?

Regards,

entry.title: How do I connect a custom tables field with a system tables column?
entry.content: I created a custom table. Now I want to connect one of the tables column with the table OLNG, but it is not in the list. How can I do this?

entry.title: Document Data Matching in Electronic Document Import Wizard
entry.content:
Hi,

When importing A/P Invoices electronically, we sometimes have invoices with hundreds of lines. We might have multiple GRPO's for the one invoice in this case. We need to be able to select multiple GRPO's at the header level. At present we can only select one base GRPO for an invoice and then we have to select the other GRPO at every individual line which is very time consuming. How can we select multiple GRPO's at the header level?

Thanks!
